TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower ([LINK=UNIT_WARRIOR]warrior[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_AXEMAN]axeman[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_CHAMPION]champion[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_PHALANX]phalanx[\LINK]) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower ([LINK=UNIT_WARRIOR]warrior[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_AXEMAN]axeman[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_CHAMPION]champion[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_PHALANX]phalanx[\LINK]) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower ([LINK=UNIT_WARRIOR]warrior[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_AXEMAN]axeman[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_CHAMPION]champion[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_PHALANX]phalanx[\LINK]) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower ([LINK=UNIT_WARRIOR]warrior[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_AXEMAN]axeman[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_CHAMPION]champion[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_PHALANX]phalanx[\LINK]) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one melee follower ([LINK=UNIT_WARRIOR]warrior[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_AXEMAN]axeman[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_CHAMPION]champion[\LINK]/[LINK=UNIT_PHALANX]phalanx[\LINK]) after conquering a city. Follower type depends on metal-working technique level

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units can be born with different races
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units can be born with different races
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units can be born with different races
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units can be born with different races
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units can be born with different races

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All your units get one free promotion after conquering a civilization

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acquire all adaptable traits from conquerred civilization leaders
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acquire all adaptable traits from conquerred civilization leaders
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acquire all adaptable traits from conquerred civilization leaders
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acquire all adaptable traits from conquerred civilization leaders
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Acquire all adaptable traits from conquerred civilization leaders

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Convert all remaining units from conquerred civilizations
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Convert all remaining units from conquerred civilizations
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Convert all remaining units from conquerred civilizations
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Convert all remaining units from conquerred civilizations
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Convert all remaining units from conquerred civilizations

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions when promoted
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions when promoted

TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains one free great commander after building your capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Military units gain free rank promotions when promoted

TEXT.English: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands
TEXT.French: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands
TEXT.German: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands
TEXT.Italian: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands
TEXT.Spanish: Decius, a man brave, loyal, and ever steadfast. Your destiny is in your hands

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][LINK=FEATURE_WINTER]Winter[\LINK] sweeps your cities as they expand

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Double the national limit of [LINK=UNIT_ADJUNCT]Adjuncts[\LINK] and [LINK=UNIT_CARETAKER_MATRON]Caretaker Matrons[\LINK]

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Redemption by defeating an "Evil" leader's unit is possible, and could trigger a Golden Age!
